Introduction
============

``plonesocial.twitter.anywhere`` integrates Twitter's @Anywhere platform into Plone.

It allows you to do

 * automatic linking of @username to their twitter page
 * automatic hovercard display on @username which allows the user to automatically follow that user.
 * add portlets with a Follow button
 * add portlets with a tweetbox

More features to come!


You can find the complete documentation at http://comlounge.net/anywhere
